name: Was My Horde!
description:
Try to survive this adventure!

When you play a game, do you ever think of the other side of the coin?

So many villains who leave their families, without knowing if they will return home after a session of very hard work. What a bad thing!

Become the bad guy, enter in the horde, decide whether to save yourself and see the game over (and your family) or sacrifice yourself (and your companions) for the glory of a player you don't know!

This is the other side of the coin!

This WAS MY HORDE!!!

Gameplay instructions

A gamepad is required.

Commands:

Left Analog - Movement
Right Analog - Rotation
L1 - Defence
R1 - Attack

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission.

Advanced Village Pack

Modular RPG Heroes Polyart

User Interface Kit
